00063 
00064 inline DoubleTab& Champ_implementation_P0::trace(const Frontiere_dis_base& fr, const DoubleTab& y, DoubleTab& x,int distant) const
00065 {
00066   if (distant)
00067     fr.frontiere().trace_elem_distant(y, x);
00068   else
00069     {
00070       fr.frontiere().trace_elem_local(y, x);
00071       x.echange_espace_virtuel();
00072     }
00073   return x;
00074 }
